title: Kumaari Lyrics Anniyan
stanzas: <div>Kumaari Oh Sukumari Song Lyrics Anniyan

Oh senjaane thone
 thaane nenaano..
ava thumbakathaanu
ambi lambaano

oh sukumaari
oh singaari
ye azhangaari ne
oh sukumaari ...

oh sukumaari
oh singaari
ye kumari nee
ye kumari nee.
kumaari.....

Kumari ...
en kadhal sikki mukki
thikki vikkudhu
Kumari ...
en nenju vimmi vimmi
pammi nikkudhu
kumari ..
en vaarthai kadai
vattri vittadhe..

naan thotrupoven
endru anjiye
en thaervai ellaam
oththi vaikkiren

vegumari sukumari
en manam oru malar adi
malarukku adithadi..

Kumari ...
en kadhal sikki mukki
thikki vikkudhu
Kumari ...
en nenju vimmi vimmi
pammi nikkudhu
kumari ..
en vaarthai kadai
vattri vittadhe..

Oh indhal kadhal enna
perum baaramaa
idhu veru kaalam illaa
garpamaa

kadhalai maraithaal
ganam thaangaamal
ennuyir sethu pogum illaiyaa

kadhalai solli illai endru
maruthaal kadhale
sethu pogum illaiyaa

oru kadhal kaditham
edhuvum manathai
mulusaai solvadhu illai

nee kangal adaithaai
kadhal nulaiya innoru
vaasal illai....
kumari.....

Naan thaanam kaetkum
oru oomaiyaa..
dhinam theigirene
idhu thaevaiyaa

koodaigal engum
pookkalai nirappi
kovilai thaedi nadakindren

koodaiyai koduthu
kumbitu mudithu
korikkai vaikka marakkindren

andha kadavulai vidavum
periyan oruvan boomiyil
undaa ? evan ?

pen kangalai paarthu
kadhalai sollum dhairiyam
ullavan, avan avan..

Kumari ...
en kadhal sikki mukki
thikki vikkudhu
Kumari ...
en nenju vimmi vimmi
pammi nikkudhu
kumari ..
en vaarthai kadai
vattri vittadhe..

Kumaraa ...
un kadhal sikki mukki
thikki vikkudhaa
Kumaraa ...
un nenju vimmi vimmi
pammi nikkudhaa
kumaraa ..
un vaarthai kadai
vattri vittadhaa.

naan thotrupoven
endru anjiye
en thaervai ellaam
oththi vaikkiren

vegumari sukumari
en manam oru malar adi
malarukku adithadi..

Oh senjaane thone
 thaane nenaano..
ava thumbakathaanu
ambi lambaano

seo.title: Kumaari Lyrics Anniyan
seo.description: Get the complete Kumaari Lyrics Anniyan from Anniyan. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Shankar Mahadevan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Anniyan, AR Rahman, Shankar Mahadevan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
